patterns: Can I get a scholarship in this university?
what type of scholarship do you offer?
Do you have a university discount?
How can i get a discount?
responses:
The list below is the following scholarship programs: 

Graduating Classes 
with highest honors (100% discount), 
with high honors(50% discount), 
with honors (25% discount), 

Dean's List 
GWA of 1.25 or better (100% discount), 
GWA of 1.50 or better (50% discount), 
Note: students must not obtain grades below 88% or 2.00 at any subject 

Peforming Arts Group 
residency as a member of at least 2.5 years will get 25% discount 

School Paper Staff 
Editor-in-chief(100% discount), 
Associate Editor(50% discount) 
Managing Editor(25% discount) 
Chief Photographer(25% discoount) 

Supreme Student Council 
President(100% discount) 
Vice President(100%) 
Secrerary, treasurer, Auditor, Business Manager and PRO (25% discount) 

College Student Council(15% discount) 
-for President only

patterns: what do i need to bring for scholarship?
what is the document requirement for scholarship?
responses: For college students, registration form and copy of grades from previous semester signed by the Registrar
For COLLEGE students, registration form and copy of grades from previous semester signed by the Registrar
For college STUDENTS, registration form and copy of grades from previous semester signed by the Registrar

patterns: What type of documents do i need for enrollment?
How can i enroll in this university?
what do i need to bring for enrollment?
responses:
For Freshmen 
 -Birth Certificate (PSA Issued) 
 -Form 138 (Original Report Card) 
-Good Moral Character Certificate
 -National Career Assessment Examination Result or Occupational Interest Inventory for HS Cert of Rating (For TESDA Programs only) 
 -3 pcs. 2×2 Colored Picture 
 -1 Long White Folder
 -1 Long Brown Envelope

For Transferees/Degree Holders
 -Birth Certificate (PSA Issued)
 -Transfer Credential

Good Moral Character Certificate
 -Transcript of Records/ Certified True Copy of Grades
 -3 pcs. 2×2 Colored Picture
 -1 Long White Folder
 -1 Long Brown Envelope 

For Cross Enrollees
 -Permit to Cross-Enroll Certificate
 -Birth Certificate (PSA Issued)
 -2 pcs. 2×2 Colored Pictures
 -1 Long White Folder
 -1 Long Brown Envelope
